ygData.subject: Re: Magic gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: 4pp for a netted tunic? I got a full set of netted for 6pp .. the most expensive bit being the gloves for 15 gold Masafumi of the 6th Circle Erollisi Marr ...
ygData.messageBody:
4pp for a netted tunic? I got a full set of netted for 6pp .. the most
expensive bit being the gloves for 15 gold

Masafumi of the 6th Circle
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris <drtns@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: 07 June 1999 00:08
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Magic gloves


>From: Chris <drtns@...>
>
>On Fri, 4 Jun 1999, Scott Prigge wrote:
>
>> From: "Scott Prigge" <sprigge@...>
>>
>> I just got done hunting in the sewer. I got 2 sets of gloves, 2 pants, 3
>> shirts, 3 bracers, and a necklace (all netted) in 2 nights (6 hours
playing
>> time). As far as I can tell, no merchants (in Qeynos) carry this stuff
as
>> ppl generally either horde it or sell it directly to other players.
>
>The prices I have seen in Quenos for Netted is generally 1pp per AC so the
>Netted shirt would be the most expensive at 4pp
>
>
>
>
